MemberSignature.Value: public void InsertColumn (int nCol, string title, int nFormat, int nWidth);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InsertColumn(int32 nCol, string title, int32 nFormat, int32 nWidth) cil managed
Public Sub InsertColumn (nCol As Integer, title As String, nFormat As Integer, nWidth As Integer)
public: void InsertColumn(int nCol, System::String ^ title, int nFormat, int nWidth);
abstract member InsertColumn : int * string * int * int -> unit

Docs.param: A zero-based index of the column being inserted.
A value that specifies the string that represents the title of the column being inserted.

A value that specifies the position of text within the column. For column zero, must be LVCFMT_LEFT. This value must be one of the following: | Value | Description | | --- | --- | | LVCFMT\_LEFT | Text is left-aligned. | | LVCFMT\_CENTER | Text is center-aligned. | | LVCFMT\_RIGHT | Text is right-aligned. |

A value that specifies the width of the column in pixels. This value must be one of the following: | Value | Description | | --- | --- | | MMCLV\_AUTO | MMC automatically determines the width of the column based on its title string. | | HIDE\_COLUMN | The column is inserted, but it is hidden. Be aware that the user can make the column visible when customizing a list view. |
Docs.summary: Adds a column to a default result pane.

Docs.param: A zero-based index that specifies the location of the column.
A pointer to the string that represents the title of the column being inserted.
Docs.summary: Sets the text of the title in a specific column.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetColumnWidth (int nCol, int nWidth);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetColumnWidth(int32 nCol, int32 nWidth) cil managed
Public Sub SetColumnWidth (nCol As Integer, nWidth As Integer)
public: void SetColumnWidth(int nCol, int nWidth);
abstract member SetColumnWidth : int * int -> unit

Docs.param: A zero-based index that specifies the location of the column relative to other columns in the result pane.

A value that specifies the width of the column. This value must be in pixels, or it can be the following value: | Value | Description | | --- | --- | | MMCLV\_AUTO | MMC automatically determines the width of the column based on the width of the text in the column title.|
Docs.summary: Sets the width, in pixels, of a specific column.
